channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Loop Earplugs Discount Codes and Deals: Save on Ear Buds and Gift Sets
item.description: Save on Loop Earplugs, including Quiet 2 and popular gift sets for improved sleep, focus, and comfort.

item.title: 7 Useful Tips for Anyone Connecting to Public Wi-Fi
item.description: Our public spaces are now awash with wireless internet. Make sure you’re getting the most out of every connection.

item.title: Ex-Splunk execs’ startup Resolve AI hits $1 billion valuation with Series A
item.description: The round was led by Lightspeed Venture Partners, according to people familiar with the deal.

item.title: Sequoia partner spreads debunked Brown shooting theory, testing new leadership
item.description: The newest episode raises questions about whether Sequoia's new leadership -- managing partners Alfred Lin and Pat Grady, who took over last month -- ...

item.title: The Best Gifts for Sleep, as Tested by Our Team
item.description: Sleep is the one thing every giftee needs, and you can help them get it. These are our tried-and-tested picks for giftable sleep aids, from masks to m...

item.title: Logitech Promo Codes and Deals: Up to $100 Off
item.description: Score up to $100 off refurbished premium products, free shipping on orders of $29+, and more at Logitech.

item.title: Gear News of the Week: LG Debuts an RGB LED TV, and Google Brings Find Hub to Wear OS
item.description: Plus: Samsung also announces new Micro RGB TVs, and a looming global memory crunch might make Nvidia reduce its supply of graphics cards.

item.title: Rocket Lab wins another defense-related space contract
item.description: The $816 million contract follows a separate $515 million — both awarded by the U.S. Space Development Agency.

item.title: Building venture-backable companies in heavily regulated spaces
item.description: This week on Build Mode, Startup Battlefield editor Isabelle Johannessen spoke to two founders who are working to make progress in industries ripe for...

item.title: Former Patagonia CEO Rose Marcario resigns from Rivian’s board
item.description: Marcario joined the board in 2021, and will maintain her position as chair overseeing the Rivian Foundation, which made its first grants last year.
